hero.title:
Hello Future Bachelier!
 This is Your Way to BAC
hero.subtitle: Get to know BACWAY and dive into an ocean of resources assured by outstanding teachers and elite bacheliers to be one of them in the near future
hero.subinfo: +600 students from all around the country considered Bacway as an ultimate resource hub for high schoolers.
hero.more: Together, we’re building a nationwide hub of collaboration and learning. Whether you’re a student aiming high or a partner sharing expertise, BACWAY connects you to a future shaped by knowledge.

about.title: We’re building the platform we wish we had during BAC
about.subtitle: Bacway is a student-driven platform dedicated to providing high school students with access to quality educational resources. Founded by a group of passionate students, Bacway aims to create a collaborative community where students can share and access study materials, past exam papers, and other resources to help them succeed in their academic journey.
values: Collaboration: We believe in the power of community and the importance of sharing knowledge.
Quality: We are committed to providing high-quality resources that meet the needs of our users.
Accessibility: We strive to make educational resources accessible to all students, regardless of their background or location.
Integrity: We uphold the highest standards of honesty and transparency in all our interactions.
about.version: Let us know what you think
about.teamdescription: The folks behind Bacway are elite students from prestigious higher institutions and universities.

contribute.title: Share Your Knowledge. Shape Their Future.
contribute.subtitle: Become part of a national community where students uplift each other by sharing real, useful BAC resources. Your uploads matter.

collab.title: We’re Stronger When We Work Together
collab.subtitle: Clubs, teachers, startups, or initiatives. BACWAY is open for collabs that bring value to students. Let’s connect and make something big.

library.title: Bacway Library
library.subtitle: Explore a wide range of educational resources uploaded by former baccalaureate students. From recorded lessons to notes and past exams, we have everything you need to prepare for the BAC exam.
